title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Blended Learning Environment for Enhancing Mathematics Writing Skill Transfer

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can write sentences explaining mathematical concepts provided in blended learning environments with 85% accuracy.
Learners can revise and improve writing skills at least three times through a mobile-based feedback system.
Learners can perceive a 70% or greater improvement in their writing abilities using self-assessment tools upon course completion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
